short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Determine where new tabs should open: From regular tabs, pinned tabs and tab groups.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you, like me, hate it when you have pinned tabs and/or tab groups, and new tabs from these mess with the organization of the fixed tabs and/or tab groups, this extension is for you!

Available settings:
[   ] In regular tabs, open new tabs at the end of the window
[   ] In pinned tabs, open new tabs at the end of the window
[   ] In tab groups, open new tabs at the end of the group or window

Customize the extension's settings by going to the plugin's options.
Unchecked options will have Chrome's default behavior for new tabs.

* Add icons created by Freepik - Flaticon
